text: vony ne blukaly zemlya ta vidznachyly naslidky dlya tsykh khto pereduvaly yim? Vony zvychayno buly bil聞she potuzhni, bil聞she kvituchyy, ta bil聞she produktyvnyy na zemli. Yikhni kur'yery poyikhaly yim z yasnymy znakamy. Otzhe, BOH ne khto obrazyv yikh; vony yavlyayut聞 soboyu kotri obrazyly yikhni vlasni dushi
